function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced walking and mobility among women due to pandemic restrictions","Impact":"Decreased physical activity, potential impact on health and well-being","Mitigation":"Encouraging safe outdoor activities and implementing transportation solutions that address safety concerns","Technologies":"Smart transportation systems, micromobility solutions","People":"Women, individuals with restricted mobility","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased commuting and increased isolation for high-density populations and older subpopulations","Impact":"Reduced social interaction, potential negative impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Promoting safe and accessible community spaces, implementing digital communication solutions to maintain social connections","Technologies":"Online communication platforms, digital community engagement tools","People":"High-density populations, older individuals, vulnerable subpopulations","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Closure of companies, schools, and shopping centers leading to restricted mobility","Impact":"Disruption of daily routines, economic impact, potential hardship for individuals reliant on physical locations for essential needs","Mitigation":"Supporting alternative access to essential services, implementing community support programs","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, community delivery solutions","People":"Employees, students, local residents","Owner":"Businesses, educational institutions, community organizations"}]}
